entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 06 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 18. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon with 30 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 25 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 06 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 23. POP 60%
